article_title: Britain Warns Boom in Real-Estate Prices Threatens Economy
article_text:
LONDON—The U.K.'s two chief financial-policy makers warned Thursday in strident tones that the British fervor for real estate had swelled into a threat to the wider economy, and the government moved to enact new powers to curb mortgage lending amid a gathering boom.

In twin speeches at a black-tie banquet for bankers and business leaders,...

twitter.description: Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne and Bank of England Gov. Mark Carney warned Thursday in strident tones that the British fervor for real estate had swelled into a threat to the wider economy, and the government moved to enact new powers to curb mortgage lending.
twitter.title: Britain Warns Boom in Real-Estate Prices Threatens Economy
